column4: can you redo that so we see the device IDs as well?  lspci -nn

useful info... to determine what driver supports hardware, get the PCI vendor:device ID (in this case you'll see 109e:036e) and search the kernel's pcimap: "grep -i '109e.*036e' /lib/modules/`uname -r`/modules.pcimap"
that all means nothing to me
